TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GroupBoxRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于呈现具有或没有视觉样式的分组框控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a group box control with or without visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`方法可用于呈现组框控件。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a group box control. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 若要绘制组框，请使用之一方法。To draw a group box, use one of the methods. 这些方法提供了各种文本绘图选项。These methods provide a variety of text drawing options. 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的分组框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, will draw the group box with the current visual style. 否则为将绘制具有经典 Windows 样式的分组框。Otherwise, will draw the group box with the classic Windows style. 这很有用，如果您正在绘制的操作系统中的当前视觉样式设置应自动匹配的自定义控件。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should automatically match the current visual style setting of the operating system. 此类包装的功能设置为其中一个元素由公开类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件方法，以便如果启用了可视样式绘制具有双边框分组框。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the method to draw a group box with a double border if visual styles are enabled. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

span.span: Draws a group box control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawGroupBox (System.Drawing.Graphics g, System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState state);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawGroupBox(class System.Drawing.Graphics g, valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle bounds, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState state) cil managed
Public Shared Sub DrawGroupBox (g As Graphics, bounds As Rectangle, state As GroupBoxState)
public: static void DrawGroupBox(System::Drawing::Graphics ^ g, System::Drawing::Rectangle bounds, System::Windows::Forms::VisualStyles::GroupBoxState state);
static member DrawGroupBox : System.Drawing.Graphics * System.Drawing.Rectangle * System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState -> unit

span.span: The used to draw the group box.
The that specifies the bounds of the group box.

param.name: state
param.span: 指定分组框可视状态的 值之一。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the visual state of the group box.

summary.span: 绘制具有指定状态和边界的分组框控件。

span.span: Draws a group box control in the specified state and bounds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的分组框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the group box with the current visual style. 否则，此方法将绘制具有经典 Windows 样式的分组框。Otherwise, this method will draw the group box with the classic Windows style. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用中自定义控件的方法方法，以便绘制具有双边框分组框。The following code example uses the method in a custom control's method to draw a group box with a double border. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在操作系统中启用了可视样式和视觉样式应用到当前应用程序，此方法将绘制具有当前的视觉样式的分组框。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the current application, this method will draw the group box with the current visual style. 否则，此方法将绘制具有经典 Windows 样式的分组框。Otherwise, this method will draw the group box with the classic Windows style.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示呈现器是否使用应用程序状态来确定呈现样式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

value.span: 如果使用应用程序状态确定呈现样式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the application state is used to determine rendering style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`、使用从设置以确定呈现样式。If is `true`, the uses the setting from to determine the rendering style. 如果是`false`，呈现器将始终使用视觉样式来呈现。If is `false`, the renderer will always render using visual styles. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性可以更改是否使用视觉样式呈现分组框。The following code example uses the property to change whether a group box is rendered using visual styles. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer/VB/form1.vb#3)]
